px-row
============

## Using px-row

`px-row` is a container used to lay out content in `px-column`s.

```html
<px-row>
	<px-column width="3" title><strong>Trigger (High):</strong></px-column>
	<px-column width="2" value>250 A</px-column>
	<px-column width="2" right>                        
		<px-title>
			<h1>12/07/2013</h1>
			<h2>09:22:12 AM</h2>
		</px-title>
	</px-column>
</px-row>
```
